sentences.en: A huge variety of fish, including cod, crayfish, bream, halibut, mussels, salmon, sea bass and sturgeon, are all farmed, providing jobs and food for people all over the world.
sentences.cn: 非常多的鱼类已被养殖，包括鳕鱼、小龙虾、鲤科鱼、大比目鱼、贻贝、鲑鱼、黑鲈和鲟鱼，为世界各地的人们提供了食物和工作岗位。

sentences.en: At a nearby table there are larger pond animals: snapping turtles, frogs and crayfish.
sentences.cn: 在旁边的桌上有更大的水生生物,蛇鳄龟, 青蛙还有小龙虾.

sentences.en: BOY: How come so many crayfish live under the rocks and stuff?
sentences.cn: 男孩: 为什么这么多小龙虾住在岩石和那些东西下面?

sentences.en: Brute mathematics predict the new species, known as the marbled crayfish, will outcompete the locals.
sentences.cn: 通过数学计算预测, 这种称为残酷的龙虾的新物种将很快消灭本地的龙虾.

sentences.en: Earthworms, crayfish and tadpoles are examples.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓、小龙虾和蝌蚪都是实例。

sentences.en: Lobster? the joss - stick hot crayfish is better!
sentences.cn: 龙虾? 情愿是香辣小龙虾!

sentences.en: Some of Britain's most endangered wildlife - from red squirrels to native crayfish - are vanishing from the countryside at an alarming rate, a report warns.
sentences.cn: 英国的一项报告表明该国大多数濒临灭绝的野生物种——从红松鼠到当地小龙虾——正在以惊人的速度消失。

sentences.en: The red swamp crayfish carries the virus of a deadly fungal disease.
sentences.cn: 红色龙虾带有一种致命的真菌疾病.

sentences.en: They can go it alone, jig for crayfish, and swing from ropes along the bank.
sentences.cn: 他们可以独自去小溪, 在水中活蹦乱跳地捉小虾, 在岸边系上绳子荡秋千.

sentences.en: We select the freshest fish, stingray , crayfish , so tong, prawn, crab etc.
sentences.cn: 我们选择最新鲜的鱼 、 方鱼、虾婆 、 苏东 、 虾 、 螃蟹等.

sentences.en: Which one of the following statement is TRUE of the red crayfish?
sentences.cn: 5关于红色龙虾,下列哪个陈述是正确的?

trans.tran_en: A crayfish is a small shellfish with five pairs of legs which lives in rivers and streams. You can eat some types of crayfish.
